author: Cleo Abram
description:
This tiny device can navigate using quantum physics rather than GPS!

Normally, a pilot needs four satellites to figure out its location…
But this device uses atoms that act like compass needles sensitive to earth’s magnetic field, which is different everywhere!

So it can record the magnetic “fingerprint” anywhere, no satellites needed!

For more optimistic science and tech stories, subscribe!

#science #magnet #GPS #quantum #technology #shorts
title: This New Device Uses a QUANTUM GPS
